about.title: Mirador Vista Serena
about.subtitle: A unique experience in harmony with nature
about.quote: For those who know how to perceive, beauty is not explained: it is felt.
about.intro1: Isn't this a display of beauty? Of course it is. Our natural beauty attracts gazes, cameras, and sincere hearts, because it has a special touch that can only be found here.
about.intro2: At Mirador Vista Serena, each visitor has the opportunity to connect with their surroundings and discover a unique, magical, and different experience. We believe in calmness, in nature, and in those moments that remain engraved in the soul.
about.history: This project was born from a love for the land and the vision of a family who dreamed of sharing this place with the world. Doña Blanca Cecilia Suárez Rincón and her husband Don Vicente Tapias, along with the support of their daughter Paula Tapias, gave life to Mirador Vista Serena with dedication, effort, and profound respect for the region.
about.impact: Today, this space is not only a destination to enjoy, but also a source of local employment and an engine that energizes commerce, promoting products and talents from the area.
about.missionText: To offer authentic experiences in a privileged natural environment, where each visitor can disconnect, breathe tranquility, and live memorable moments. We promote responsible tourism, the use of regional products, and the generation of opportunities for our community.
about.visionText: To be a regional reference in nature, gastronomy, and wellness experiences, recognized for our warm attention, our commitment to the environment, and the ability to create unique moments for each visitor. We aspire to continue growing sustainably, strengthening the local economy and preserving the natural beauty that makes us special.
